title: Europa Universalis IV - MP Patch [RTVFiX] [Proper]
description:
Reuploaded because I made a mistake. Ooops.

This should be all the files you need to play multiplayer; the source I had for this has since taken the file down so I am mostly working from memory. Follow the directions listed below:

1. Install EU4 (I recommend FTL's release).
2. Install patch 1.1.1 (FTLDOX)
3. Install patch 1.2.1 (3DM)
4. Install the files provided in this torrent. (RTVFiX)
5. Create a Steam account (a new one, if you already have one; use fake info).
6. Run Steam and login with your fake account.
7. Play (Hamachi and Tunngle both work).
